songs.title: Getting Over You (R3hab Remix)
songs.album: I met you when I was 18. (the extras)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Lauv]
Running from the morning
Think I hit a wall
Late nights, not you
Running from the moment
So I don't recall
Late nights, not you

[Pre-Chorus 1: Lauv]
Waking up in a cold sweat
Someone else in this cold bed
I'd do anything to not be alone
All alone with the ceiling
All alone with this feeling
And I wonder if I'll ever let go

[Chorus: Lauv]
I tried spending my nights under
Someone new
But the truth is
I could spend my whole life getting over you

[Post-Chorus: Lauv]
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Getting over you
Getting over you
Getting over you
Yeah, yeah, yeah

[Verse 2: Lauv]
Drowning in my coffee
To wash the alcohol
Out my bloodstream
Sitting here I wonder
If we hadn't been at all
Who would I be

[Pre-Chorus 2: Lauv]
Waking up in a cold sweat
Someone else in this cold bed
And I wonder if I'll ever let go

[Chorus: Lauv]
I tried spending my nights under
Someone new
But the truth is
I could spend my whole life getting over you

[Post-Chorus: Lauv]
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Getting over you
Getting over you
Getting over you
Yeah, yeah, yeah

[Outro]
Getting over you
Getting over you
Getting over you
Getting over you
Getting over you
Getting over you
